967340.name: DERU - Official Soundtrack
967340.description:
The fantastic soundscape of DERU - The Art of Cooperation created by Michel Barengo consists of 8 tracks with a 24 minutes total runtime.

By purchasing this OST-DLC you directly support our composer Michel Barengo for his fantastic work.

Tracklist:

1. Entrance ( 01:42 )
2. Riddle ( 04:08 )
3. Together ( 03:27 )
4. Awake ( 03:31 )
5. What's Happening ( 05:37 )
6. Dark Matter ( 02:52 )
7. Dance With Me ( 02:01 )
8. The End ( 00:56 )

Please Note: once purchased, the bonus content will appear in the game's root installation directory.
967340.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
